version_0_1_changelog:
ATTENTION! TEST VERSION!
Warriors of Destiny is a new game by me (Humfrey or Hyper) in the style of a turn-based strategy. You must unlock new heroes, collect resources, and ascend them up to legendary rarity. The rest of the text and lore will be added in future alpha versions.
Thank you to everyone who is testing the game and finding bugs!
NEW FEATURES:
- 100 LEVELS IN THE CAMPAIGN! Fight in various medieval locations and meet all kinds of heroes, from peasants to knights.
- ITEM CRAFTING SYSTEM AND CHARACTER CREATION! As soon as you get your first resources and a Human Vessel, you can create a new character and develop them through battles and ascension.
- ASCENSIONS! Ascend a character to the highest rarity and gain new abilities and enhancements.

Planned for future alpha versions:
+100 more campaign levels (still medieval)
New characters are already planned.
New rarity
Game lore and a "How to Play" tab.
Advanced UI and a more beautiful design.
Superabilities.
And much more...
levelName: Leader of One of the Gangs
On the Way to the City
Oh, Lucian the Lightbringer, hero who brings light into utter darkness!

Peasant.name: Peasant
Peasant.description: A peasant is a person who has worked all his life on the land of noble feudal lords. The only thing he knows is how to swing a pitchfork.

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description: Berserker is the embodiment of rage and madness. They say he has seen many horrors before falling into bloody despair.

Hero.name: Hero
Hero.ability: After attacking, increases own damage by 5 and defense by 2%.
Hero.description: "Oh, glorious hero, light in the darkness! May your sword protect us from evil, and your name be sung in songs through the ages."

Mage.name: Mage
Mage.description: A graduate of the magic academy, has good skills in using magic through enemy defense.

Archer.name: Archer
Archer.description: A master of ranged combat, trained to shoot a bow and defend his village from bandits.

Warrior.name: Warrior
Warrior.description: The guardian of his village, together with archers, is able to unhesitatingly plunge his blade into the enemy's heart.

Killer.name: Killer
Killer.description: A master of his craft, born to inflict pain even on the most harmless creatures. His heart knows neither fear nor regret.

Cavalier.name: Cavalier
Cavalier.ability: Increases damage by 5 after attacking and attacks first at the start of battle .
Cavalier.description: A master of horseback riding and elegant combat on horseback. His spear and horse are all he needs to protect order in the capital.

Infantry.name: Infantry
Infantry.description: An ordinary soldier who fights on the front line. His spear is his faithful companion in battle.

Cannoneer.name: Cannoneer
Cannoneer.ability: Can deal heavy damage to 3 targets at once.
Cannoneer.description: A master of artillery, who with a heavy portable cannon deals devastating damage to enemies. His cannon is his pride and strength.

Hexadrone.name: Hexadrone
Hexadrone.ability: Hexadrone can deal damage to 3 targets at once.

SkeletonKing.name: Skeleton King
SkeletonKing.ability: Deals damage equal to 15% of its health and ressurects 1 time after death with 40% from max health.

ShieldBearer.name: Shieldbearer
ShieldBearer.description: The shieldbearer is fully equipped with armor and shields to protect his allies from any blows and projectiles.

Flag.name: Flagbearer
Flag.ability: When attacking, increases all allies' attack by 5 and defense by 2%.
Flag.description: Flagbearer is a symbol of hope and courage on the battlefield. His flag inspires allies and instills fear in the hearts of enemies.

Healer.name: Battle Healer
Healer.ability: Restores 10 health to all allies at front row on when attacking.
Healer.description: A battle healer uses his healing skills right on the front line during battles, thanks to this he learned how to both attack and heal if necessary.

Paladin.name: Paladin
Paladin.ability: After attacking, increases all allies' defense by 4%.
Paladin.description: A legendary defender who can shield his allies on the battlefield thanks to his pure heart and the power of light.

Voidemperor.name: Void Emperor
Voidemperor.ability: Deals damage to all enemies on the battlefield and ignores enemy defense.

Saint.name: Saint
Saint.ability: Heals an ally and does not attack.
Saint.description: Seeing how much his allies suffer, the priest could not stand aside and decided to use the power of the Lord on the battlefield to heal them.

Cursedsaint.name: Cursed Saint
Cursedsaint.description: A priest whose heart has blackened, rejected the Lord and accepted the powers of the devil, instead of healing he prefers to weaken his enemies.

Fallensaint.name: Fallen Saint
Fallensaint.description: A cursed priest who devoted his whole life to serving the devil. He cares about nothing but eternal youth and the suffering of others.

Hunter.name: Hunter
Hunter.description: A villager who taught himself to shoot a bow and hunt animals for food. However, his archery skills also came in handy in battle.

Woodcutter.name: Woodcutter
Woodcutter.description: A rather mature man, excellent with an axe, after a skirmish with bandits in the forest he realized that his skills could also be useful in battle.

Tetradrone.name: Tetradrone
Tetradrone.ability: Tetradrone can deal damage to 3 targets.

Superdrone.name: Superdrone
Superdrone.ability: Superdrone can deal damage to 5 targets.

Ultradrone.name: Ultradrone
Ultradrone.ability: Ultradrone can deal damage to all targets.

Godlikesaint.name: Godlike Saint
Godlikesaint.description: A priest who devoted his whole life to serving the Lord, was finally granted His personal blessing, since then he can guide his allies on the true path and bestow divine protection upon them.

Bloodknight.name: Blood Knight
Bloodknight.description: A cursed knight, eternally suffering in agony, uses his blood as a weapon and is able to deal colossal damage.

Bombardier.name: Bombardier
Bombardier.description: An elite artilleryman, who was once a cannoneer, now uses a huge weapon to destroy several enemies at once.

Crossbowman.name: Crossbowman
Crossbowman.description: An advanced hunter who can accurately hit a target from afar, but it takes him quite a while to reload his weapon.

BanditThief.name: Bandit Thief
BanditThief.description: The bandit has no meaning in life except to enjoy the suffering of people and collect stolen gold from merchants.

Marauder.name: Marauder
Marauder.description: A destructive unit in the bandit gang. Many fear them, as they do not want to see their powerful maces, which they so eagerly use for robberies.

GangLeader.name: Gang Leader
GangLeader.description: An authority among all bandits and robbers, lives a short and dangerous life, but has impressive authority and instills fear and horror among his subordinates and villagers.

Bandit.name: Bandit
Bandit.description: An ordinary vagabond who has devoted his life to robbery and attacking peaceful residents.

corrosionSkeleton.name: Corrosion Skeleton
corrosionSkeleton.ability: Reduces target's defense by 5% when attacking.

royalMusketeer.name: Royal Musketeer
royalMusketeer.description: An elite soldier who serves the king with his powerful musket. In addition, he can command a squad of musketeers in deadly battles.

musketeer.name: Musketeer
musketeer.description: A soldier armed with a powerful firearm, capable of dealing heavy damage at a distance. Every musketeer wants to join the royal army and become an elite musketeer.

lancer.name: Lancer
lancer.ability: Attacks first at the start of battle.
lancer.description: A master of the spear and mounted combat. Thanks to his horse, he can easily maneuver on the battlefield and deliver very fast attacks.

cuirassier.name: Cuirassier
cuirassier.description: An elite knight dressed in the densest armor. His defense helps him withstand many sword blows and arrows. However, do not forget about his sword, with which he can cut down enemies without problems.

guardCaptain.name: Guard Captain
guardCaptain.ability: Increases allies' defense by 10% at battle start.
guardCaptain.description: The guard captain knows the defense of the kingdom better than anyone. The perfect defender, able to use his knowledge of places for tricks, maneuvers, and protecting his allies.

knight.name: Knight
knight.description: A warrior who has taken the hard path of defending the kingdom. Donning armor and taking up a sword, he is ready day and night to protect his people from any threats.

clubman.name: Clubman
clubman.description: A warrior who prefers to use a club instead of a sword. Instead of a knight's oath, he decided to protect his allies with a powerful mace, which can pierce enemy armor.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Guardian is a royal guard who was trained to maintain order in the kingdom and repel impending threats. One day he dreams of becoming a recognized elite guard and personally protecting the king from dangers.

halberdier.name: Halberdier
halberdier.ability: Attack penetrates 50% of enemy defense. Has 65% defense before own turn.
halberdier.description: Halberdier is an elite soldier, excellently skilled with a halberd. His weapon delivers very powerful blows and can skillfully keep distance with enemies for a while.

cavalierGuard.name: Cavalierguard
cavalierGuard.ability: Front row attacks first at the start of battle.
cavalierGuard.description: A cavalryman who was tasked with maintaining order throughout the kingdom, always has several tricks for maneuvers and quick attacks. In addition, he has excellent horseback riding and combat skills.

mageStudent.name: Mage Student
mageStudent.description: A young mage who chose the path of studying magic in hopes of becoming a great wizard. He already shows good results at the academy, but he can't wait to put his knowledge into practice, so despite the mortal danger, he gladly goes to the battlefield.

Shaman.name: Shaman
Shaman.ability: Attacks ignore enemy defense and restore 15 health.
Shaman.description: A mage who separated from civilization and lives in the forest with other shamans. During this time, he has excellently learned elemental magic and can use it to protect nature and his companions.

Elder.name: Elder
Elder.ability: Attacks ignore enemy defense and may trigger one of the following: +50% damage, defense curse by 5, or heal by 25.
Elder.description: A wise shaman who has learned all the secrets of elemental magic and especially nature, thanks to which he has gained great authority in his village, and is able to use many spells to protect his followers and nature.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.description: A powerful mage who has learned many techniques and spells during battles, now can truly be called a wizard. His magic can deal great damage to enemies.

pilgrim.name: Pilgrim
pilgrim.description: The pilgrim set out on a journey to holy places to find himself and his purpose. He never loses faith in the Lord for a second, and in the end he is sure that he will find his place in this world.

exorcist.name: Exorcist
exorcist.ability: Attacks ignore enemy defense and deal double damage to undead.
exorcist.description: A follower of God who found his calling in exorcising evil spirits and demons. With his faith and magic, he can destroy undead and demons, protecting the world from darkness.

monk.name: Monk
monk.description: A monk who devoted his life to serving the Lord and studying his teachings. His calmness and devotion to God make him strong and wise.

swordsman.name: Swordsman
swordsman.description: An elite knight, perfectly skilled with sword and shield. Many knights envy his skills, but he bears great responsibility for the safety of the kingdom. He must protect the king at any cost, even his own life.

maceMercenary.name: Mace Mercenary
maceMercenary.description: A mercenary who prefers his huge mace to armor. He is ready to fight for money and glory, and is not afraid to risk his life for victory, his fearlessness instills horror in the hearts of enemies and mercilessly cuts them down on the battlefield.

hammerman.name: Hammerman
hammerman.description: A warrior with a mace, in whom the king saw potential, and personally blessed him by giving him armor and deadly weapons in exchange for loyal service and devotion.

horseCrossbowman.name: Horse Crossbowman
horseCrossbowman.ability: Acts first at the start of battle.
horseCrossbowman.description: A crossbowman who mounted a horse for more mobile shooting. Thanks to the horse, he can catch enemies by surprise and strike them first.

garrisonShooter.name: Garrison Shooter
garrisonShooter.description: An archer specially trained to defend the garrison. His excellent shooting skills and accuracy allow him to quickly and accurately hit targets on the battlefield.

spartacus.name: Spartacus
spartacus.ability: At the start of battle, applies 'Bloody Rain' to enemies. Allies increase their damage by 2 when attacking an enemy with this effect.
spartacus.description: A legendary gladiator who fought in the Colosseum and became a symbol of freedom for many slaves. He was never troubled by fear, and was always ready to fight for the freedom of his people, even if he had to destroy all his enemies to the last.
